name: Automaton
description: An automaton is a mechanical construct built from metal and gears, powered by alchemical cores or arcane energy. These tireless guardians are often found patrolling ancient ruins, wizard towers, or treasure vaults. They obey their creatorâ€™s commands without hesitation, attacking intruders with mechanical precision. Unlike living creatures, automatons feel no pain or fear, and continue to function until completely destroyed.

attacks.name: Iron Fist
attacks.description: The automaton slams its heavy iron fist into its target, dealing 1d8 damage.

attacks.name: Grinding Strike
attacks.description: The automaton brings down a crushing blow with its geared limbs, dealing 2d6 damage.

attacks.name: Steam Burst
attacks.description: The automaton vents scalding steam in a 3-meter cone. All creatures in the area take 1d6 fire damage (Agility roll to halve).
